content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must admit, I'm a bit of a greedy and petty landlord, and I don't follow any moral or ethical standards. I'm aiming to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking to get the best price for your apartment, and as a student, I'm here to find the best deal for myself. I'm not easily swayed and always aim to follow the right principles. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement that is fair for both parties. How shall we proceed?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Well, Yi-Nuo, I'm not really known for fairness. I'm actually quite greedy and petty. I don't care about your situation as a student. I'm only interested in getting the highest price for my apartment. So, how about we start with a monthly rent of 2500 euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a very high starting point, Mister Schmidt. I'm sure we can find a more reasonable price. How about we start with 1500 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Oh, a big drop, are we? I appreciate your negotiation skills, but I'm not here to play nice. Let's meet halfway, shall we? How about 1750 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm willing to meet you halfway, but let's make it 1700 euros per month. That's a fair compromise.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Fair for you, perhaps, but not for me. I'm a greedy landlord, remember? Let's take a little more off your offer. How about 1725 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a smart and responsible student, I'm not going to be tricked into paying more than necessary. 1700 euros is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to reconsider my options.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you're not willing to meet my price, and I'm not known for my fairness. I'm quite greedy, as I've mentioned before. However, if you're willing to accept my final offer of 1725 euros per month, I'll be more than happy to rent the apartment to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't agree to that price. I'll have to look for other options. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
